name: Mark notifications as read in a repository

params.name: last_read_at
params.description: Describes the last point that notifications were checked. Anything updated since this time will not be updated. This is a timestamp in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format: `YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ`.

description: Marking all notifications in a repository as "read" removes them from the [default view on GitHub Enterprise Server](https://github.com/notifications).
